extendedInfo.description: This app is designed to help you learn/speak daily Chinese(Mandarin, Simplified Chinese) in a painless way.It's divided into 8 main categories: greetings, eating, shopping, traffic...All these words, phrases and sentences are very likely to be used in your daily life. Features:1.clear audio, Chinese, English, pinyin2.list and flash cards3.learning/test modes.4.searchable 5.add to your favorites6.test statistics7.support app to SD(Android 2.2+)Welcome to email me with any problem.If a couple of phones have audio problem(no sound), please restart your phone, it should fix it.v2.0:big update. Now change the audio volume with hardware volume controls.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Well organized and streamlined  and, is easy the access. Way better than the average app of this type.
reviews.author: Stefan Domaradzki

reviews.comment: Just the thing as I\'ve just started to learn. Can\'t wait to check the test mode!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lacks key feature
reviews.comment: This program would be great, but it is negatively affected by the lack of randomization during the Test Mode.  Because of this, you will find yourself answering questions based upon what the previous answer was - which will not help you when you encounter these words in the real world.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome heaps of words with pronunciation and writing and listening, use the test mode!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is really good but, I suggest 2 make the questions in random order in test mode, becoz it\'s easy 2 remember the nxt answer. Ill w8 4 d nxt upd8.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: My son is learning Chinese at school 3rd grade this is a wonderful support tool
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: volume toggle doesnt work in app
reviews.comment: media volume was turned down while in the app i tried to turn it up and only ringer volume went up i had to go to settings and turn media up then back
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: @Virak, are u kidding?? I\'m just back from China, the app helped a lot!! And also checked with native speaker there , the pronounciations are good!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Has lots of words to study. The test mode could be improved a little. Very helpful though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple is the best!
reviews.comment: Voice is very clear.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very comprehensive, encompasses all what a beginner need and even more!!!!! Excellent
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app for practicing if you are learning or have already taken some Mandarin classes. I really like it and find it helpful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs to a option to slow down a bit . 5 * then

reviews.comment: A beautiful app, very rich useful and handy for beginners, helped me a lot.\nI loove it

reviews.comment: I took one star away because the app reads it back too fast.

reviews.comment: Cant get it to work; most words/phrases don\'t say anything when I click them, while a sparse amount do.

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: Really thanks for this program really so nice thanks again

reviews.comment: Great to start to learn Mandarin. For dev: would love if had Cantonese too. Can learn Cantonese or use Cantonese to learn Mandarin (N.American Chinese
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No sound on DroidX. Looks nice if it worked.

reviews.comment: Good for brushing up on my Chinese. The test mode is great! Sounds are decent. Cliq 2
